snippet: As the focus turns to the Senate to come to a deal on ending the government shutdown and raising the debt ceiling, senators from both sides of the aisle will join the Sunday shows to talk about whether they’re up to the task.
abstract: As the focus turns to the Senate to come to a deal on ending the government shutdown and raising the debt ceiling, senators from both sides of the aisle will join the Sunday shows to talk about whether they’re up to the task.
